00019 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00020 {
00021   MinetHandle mux, sock;
00022 
00023   MinetInit(MINET_TCP_MODULE);
00024 
00025   mux=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) ? MinetConnect(MINET_IP_MUX) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00026   sock=MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) ? MinetAccept(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) : MINET_NOHANDLE;
00027 
00028   if (MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_IP_MUX) && mux==MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00029     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't connect to mux"));
00030     return -1;
00031   }
00032 
00033   if (MinetIsModuleInConfig(MINET_SOCK_MODULE) && sock==MINET_NOHANDLE) {
00034     MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Can't accept from sock module"));
00035     return -1;
00036   }
00037 
00038   MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("tcp_module handling TCP traffic"));
00039 
00040   MinetEvent event;
00041 
00042   while (MinetGetNextEvent(event)==0) {
00043     if (event.eventtype!=MinetEvent::Dataflow 
00044         || event.direction!=MinetEvent::IN) {
00045       MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("Unknown event ignored."));
00046     } else {
00047       if (event.handle==mux) {
00048         Packet p;
00049         MinetReceive(mux,p);
00050         unsigned tcphlen=TCPHeader::EstimateTCPHeaderLength(p);
00051         cerr << "estimated header len="<<tcphlen<<"\n";
00052         p.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<TCPHeader>(tcphlen);
00053         IPHeader ipl=p.FindHeader(Headers::IPHeader);
00054         TCPHeader tcph=p.FindHeader(Headers::TCPHeader);
00055 
00056         cerr << "TCP Packet: IP Header is "<<ipl<<" and ";
00057         cerr << "TCP Header is "<<tcph << " and ";
00058 
00059         cerr << "Checksum is " << (tcph.IsCorrectChecksum(p) ? "VALID" : "INVALID");
00060         
00061       }
00062       if (event.handle==sock) {
00063         SockRequestResponse s;
00064         MinetReceive(sock,s);
00065         cerr << "Received Socket Request:" << s << endl;
00066       }
00067     }
00068   }
00069   return 0;
00070 }
